title: Content Demo1
content:
Section DemoThe content area of the application itself is split into sections, these can be used to split content.

To navigate through sections, simply swipe left or right.
Displaying Textual ContentFor the application, text is one of the most important ways of conveying content. For this reason, we have implemented methods which allow stakeholders to convey information easily. These methods include: TitlesSubtitesAnd various other text representations such as bold and underline
Displaying ImagesThe application also allows for the inclusion of images.test.jpgThese images can be referenced by file name and automatically added into the content.
Displaying VideoThe application also allows for the embedding of videos.These videos simply need to be linked within the JSON files and they will automatically be embedded within the content.

This functionality will allow for the stakeholders to convey their point futher using media.
Displaying LinksLinks can also be included within the content http://www.moneysavingexpert.com/,MoneySavingExpert.

Using this method, stakeholders can rename the link itself to make it more user friendly http://www.moneysavingexpert.com/,Renamed link.
QuizzesFinally, we have begun work on the inclusion of quizzes within sections as seen below:testQuiz.json, Test Quiz
Displaying AllAnd of course, all elements can be used in conjuction with each other.Here's a video And an image:test.jpg
